title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') as a filter in a table, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') as a filter in a table, an error message is thrown.
EB: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') as a filter in a table, no error message should be thrown.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Create a datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the value1 field of the filter, input the value new Date('3/2/2005'). For example, new Date('3/2/2005').
